price: Algunos de ellos te miran, pero, ¿acaso tú puedes hacer ver a quien Dios ha enceguecido?
arabic: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَنظُرُ إِلَيۡكَۚ أَفَأَنتَ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man yanẓuru ilayka afa-anta tahdī al-ʿum'ya walaw kānū lā yub'ṣirūna
